post:
Servers location is Amsterdam, Netherlands.
Also other configuration available (also with instant activation):

Xeon Quad Core E3-1270-V2-16Gb ECC DDR4 RAM - 2 x 1000 SATA disk 1 Gbit port traffic 30 TB - **45€/month**
Xeon Hexa Core E-2286G 64Gb ECC DDR4 RAM 2 x 480 GB SSD 1 Gbit port traffic - 30 TB - **115€/month**

Setup fee: **0€**

To place order, register account at https://euro.rustelekom.net and verify your phone. You can also request us to add order into your account if you facing any troubles with placing order. Please open ticket to support team and refer to this post. 

Looking glass for Germany and Netherlands location can be found at https://www.robovps.biz/en/help/55-our_data_center.html

Feel free touch us for presales question by webchat on site or by contact email: support@rustelekom.net
We accept Cards, PayPal, PaySera, QIWI, Webmoney, Crypto (BTC, ETH etc.) payments.
